name: Twirly Toad
description:
Sit back, relax and twirl in Twirly Toad; a relaxing and casual bug catching game. Satiate Todd the Toad's endless hungry by simply tapping to extend his tongue. Then, using the end of it, catch multiple insects while he spins round and round on his lily pad. Harness your accuracy and skills to finish the meal in time but watch out for wasp. Unlock over 50 different skins for Todd to increase your rewards and climb to the top of the leaderboard.

Do you have what it takes to complete all 200 levels? Todd sure hopes so!

FEATURES:

- Over 200 Levels of twirly fun
- Over 50 unique Toad designs
- Utilize strategy to feed Todd while avoiding deadly wasps
- Rise to the top of the Leaderboards to become Todd's ultimate champion!

Like us on Facebook! https://www.facebook.com/bootjetgames/
